item.title: ChatGPT users hate GPT-5’s “overworked secretary” energy, miss their GPT-4o buddy
item.description: “I want my GPT-4o back and I’ll do anything to get it.”

item.title: OpenAI Finally Launched GPT-5. Here's Everything You Need to Know

item.title: OpenAI’s most capable AI model, GPT-5, may be coming in August

item.title: OpenAI jumps gun on International Math Olympiad gold medal announcement
item.description: Non-math AI model reportedly solves proofs at human speeds, but early reveal roils community.
